children.value: Make a single selection from a set of alternatives.
Bind the value to the name of the currently selected item through

props.code:
import { ref } from 'vue'
const checked = ref('1')

children.value: causes the radio button group to be arranged horizontally.

props.code:
<z-radio-group v-model="checked" direction="horizontal">
   <z-radio name="1">Radio button 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2">Radio button 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

<z-radio-group v-model="checked" disabled>
   <z-radio name="1">Radio button 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2">Radio button 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

children.value: , and the radio button shapes correspond to square and dot shapes respectively.

props.code:
<z-radio-group v-model="checked" shape="square">
   <z-radio name="1">Radio button 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2">Radio button 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

<z-radio-group v-model="checked" shape="dot">
   <z-radio name="1">Radio 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2">Radio 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

children.value: Set the icon color of the checked state through the

props.code:
<z-radio-group v-model="checked">
   <z-radio name="1" checked-color="#ee0a24">Radio button 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2" checked-color="#ee0a24">Radio button 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

children.value: The size of the icon can be customized through the

props.code:
<z-radio-group v-model="checked">
   <z-radio name="1" icon-size="24px">Radio button 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2" icon-size="24px">Radio button 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

children.value: slot, and determine whether it is selected through

props.code: Radio button 1 radio button 2

<script lang="ts" setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'
const checked = ref('1')
const activeIcon =
   'https://cdn.zebraui.com/zebra-ui/images/assets/demo-select.png'
const inactiveIcon =
   'https://cdn.zebraui.com/zebra-ui/images/assets/demo-noselect.png'
</script>

children.value: to adjust the text position to the left side of the radio button.

props.code:
<z-radio-group v-model="checked">
   <z-radio name="1" label-position="left">Radio button 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2" label-position="left">Radio button 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

children.value: attribute, clicking on content other than the icon will not trigger the radio button switch.

props.code:
<z-radio-group v-model="checked">
   <z-radio name="1" label-disabled>Radio button 1</z-radio>
   <z-radio name="2" label-disabled>Radio button 2</z-radio>
</z-radio-group>

children.value: When used with the cell component, you need to introduce the

props.code:
<z-radio-group v-model="checked">
   <z-cell-group>
     <z-cell title="Radio button 1" clickable @click="checked = '1'">
       <template #right-icon>
         <z-radio name="1" />
       </template>
     </z-cell>
     <z-cell title="Radio button 2" clickable @click="checked = '2'">
       <template #right-icon>
         <z-radio name="2" />
       </template>
     </z-cell>
   </z-cell-group>
</z-radio-group>

children.value: Identifier, usually a unique string or number
Whether to disable text content clicks
The identifier of the currently selected item
Whether to disable all radio buttons
The icon size of all radio buttons, the default unit is
The checked state color of all radio buttons
Triggered when the radio button is clicked
Event triggered when the binding value changes
The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
